text: The 2011 Seguros Bolívar Open Pereira was a professional tennis tournament played on Hard courts. It was part of the 2011 ATP Challenger Tour. It took place in Pereira, Colombia between 4 and 10 April 2011. ==ATP entrants== ===Seeds=== {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! Nationality ! Player ! Ranking* ! Seeding |- | | Alejandro Falla | 108 | 1 |- | | Eduardo Schwank | 121 | 2 |- | | João Souza | 125 | 3 |- | | Éric Prodon | 129 | 4 |- | | Paolo Lorenzi | 154 | 5 |- | | Diego Junqueira | 155 | 6 |- | | Rogério Dutra da Silva | 159 | 7 |- | | Leonardo Mayer | 163 | 8 |} *Rankings are as of March 21, 2011. ===Other entrants=== The following players received wildcards into the singles main draw: * Nicolás Barrientos * Manuel Barros * Sebastián López * Eduardo Struvay The following players received entry from the qualifying draw: * Júlio César Campozano * Guillermo Durán * Marco Trungelliti * Denis Zivkovic ==Champions== ===Singles=== Paolo Lorenzi def. Rogério Dutra da Silva, 7–5, 6–2 ===Doubles=== Marcel Felder / Carlos Salamanca def. Alejandro Falla / Eduardo Struvay, 7–6(5), 6–4 ==References== *Official website of Seguros Bolívar Tennis *ITF search *ATP official site Seguros Bolivar Open Pereira Category:Tennis tournaments in Colombia Category:Seguros Bolívar Open Pereira
title: 2011 Seguros Bolívar Open Pereira
